name: Bunbun Saves The World
description:
Gif of the game in action!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Common Questions

I'm pressing "I," and it's not doing anything.
Mines will spawn passively once unlocked.  They spawn every 8 seconds roughly.  Once spawned, you press "I" to blow up all the mines in the area.  They have bright red lights on them.

Do any of my attacks hurt me?
Nope!  You don't collide with them either!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In BunbunSavesTheWorld, you play as a cowardly bunny who has to fight his way out of the city! ...or just rely on pure luck.  

Bunbun doesn't actually do anything.  He's a coward who's trying to run away from all the violence.  He's found himself in the middle of a flooded city that has been taken over by robots.   All he wants to do is leave!  A helicopter on the other side of the city will get him to safety.  

Despite being terrified of everything, bunbun is one lucky bunny.  Speeding cars, falling barricades, mines, and asteroids will come to bunbun's aid out of thin air.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BunbunSavesTheWorld is a Beat 'em Up game without any punches or kicks.  Instead of charging head on, you have to run away from your foes and rely on "chance" to save the day.  All the scripts were made during the jam, but almost every other visual/audio asset was pulled from various free-to-use sources.  A complete list of all the assets used is below.

There were two direct contributors to this project.

(Me) Jonah Grimm - Programming, Level Design, Game Design, Attacks, Presentation, Camera

Jacob Knaup - Programming, Enemy AI, Player Movement, Game Design

This was made for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam.  

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
